subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The top two men's players, Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic, have yet to be challenged at the U.S. Open. But fans should be in for a treat when Andy Roddick plays Juan Martin Del Potro.
snippet: The top two men's players, Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic, have yet to be challenged at the U.S. Open. But fans should be in for a treat when Andy Roddick plays Juan Martin Del Potro.
